adHeader: Live-in CAREGIVER, petsitter (elderly, or dogs, cats care available)
adDetails: Experienced, mature, non-smoking gentleman will take care of elders, also great w/pets, plants & grounds when you travel or need help locally, in the local Bay Area. Contact me soon to describe your situation and/or to discuss your specific needs. I'm looking forward to speaking with you soon show contact info***
